divs: sighting detailsi was reviewing my security cameras. i have been reviewing security images for 9 years and have never seen anything like this. it flew in a swooping motion & was gone very fast. i tried to pick it up on other cameras but it flew out of range. it looked like its wings were connected at the back of the body, not the middle birds, bats, etc. eyes looked big, round and dark- like a possum. the creature looked like it might be clear or possibly glowing\reflective. very strange. i have video of it & have shown other employees and a customer & none of us know what to make of it. the video quality isn't great, but if someone has the equipment to clean it up & figure out what it is, i'd like to know.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Fairfield
There were no other sightings in Fairfield on or around August 5th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Some type of unknown flying creature or spirit maybe- on video
